code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with 2 years history of Heart. he is a white m aged 34 ys. o:Height 67 in, Weight 189 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18, Transthoracic echocardiography shows Ventricular Septal Rupture a:Myocardial Infarction p:administered nitroglycerin - 2.5 mg 2 x day, performed Transthoracic echocardiography, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

s:patient presents with Heart. he is a white male jockey aged 35 Ys. describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 4 years in his past he does not smoke o:Height 66 in, Weight 182 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 14 a:Myocardial Infarction p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed metoprolol - 50 mg daily, and ordered ECG, Troponin l, CKMB.
